articles.author: Eddie Makuch
articles.title: Official Xbox Toaster Announced, Imprints Xbox Logo On Your Bagel - GameSpot
articles.description: Get your body ready for the "Optimal Card Experience" and the "next generation" of toasting.
articles.content: Following the Xbox mini-fridge comes yet another official Xbox appliance: the Xbox Series S Toaster. This very real product aims to offer its user the "Optimal Carb Experience" with a number of nice-… [+1599 chars]
